doc:
Casey Donovan (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Casey_Donovan_(actor) 0 Casey Donovan (born John Calvin "Cul" Culver; November 2, 1943 – August 10, 1987) was an American male pornographic film actor from the late 1960s until the mid-1980s, appearing primarily in adult films and videos catering to gay male audiences, during the Golden Age of Porn. Following a brief career as a Latin teacher and a stint as a highly paid male model, Donovan appeared in the film that would cement his status as a gay icon, Boys in the Sand, in 1971. Attempts to build on his notoriety to achieve mainstream crossover success failed, but Donovan continued to be a bankable star in the adult industry for the next 15 years. He was briefly a mainstream actor, who appeared on stage, as well as a theatre producer and manager and appeared as himself in TV series Emerald City. Casey_Donovan ( born John_Calvin_"_Cul_"_Culver ; November_2_,_1943 – August_10_,_1987 ) was an_American_male_pornographic_film_actor from the_late_1960s until the_mid-1980s , appearing primarily in adult_films_and_videos catering to gay_male_audiences , during the_Golden_Age of Porn . Following a_brief_career as a_Latin_teacher and a_stint as a_highly_paid_male_model , Donovan appeared in the_film that would_cement his_status as a_gay_icon , Boys in the_Sand , in 1971 . Attempts to_build on his_notoriety to_achieve mainstream_crossover_success failed , but Donovan continued_to_be a_bankable_star in the_adult_industry for the_next_15_years . He was briefly a_mainstream_actor , who appeared on stage , as_well_as a_theatre_producer_and_manager and appeared as himself in TV_series_Emerald_City .
